articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Rare set of varied factors triggered Black Death - Ars Technica
articles.description: Volcanic eruptions in the mid-1340s triggered a chain of events that brought the Black Death to Europe.

articles.title: iPhone 17 makes standard screen protectors not so useful - 9to5Mac
articles.description: The iPhone 17 line includes a new anti-reflective technology, but it turns out standard screen protectors aren’t the best match.
articles.content:
The iPhone 17 lineup includes a new Ceramic Shield 2 with anti-reflective technology, but it turns out standard screen protectors arent the best match for the new displays.

articles.title: Smart material instantly changes colors on demand for use in textiles and consumer products - Phys.org
articles.description: Scientists have developed a revolutionary technique for creating colors that can change on command. These are structural colors that don't rely on dyes or pigments and can be used for display signage, adaptive camouflage and smart safety labels, among other a…
